This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Laid Over by Subcommittee

Items.Title: Application no. 20065405 HAQ, an Urban Development Action Area Project, located at 145-14 105th Avenue, Council District no. 28, Borough of Queens.  This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant to Article 16 of the New York General Municipal Law, at the request of the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development, and pursuant to Section 696 of the General Municipal Law for an exemption from real property taxes.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
